alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:39AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hampshire and northwestern Franklin Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1239 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Savoy, or 10 miles southeast of North Adams, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Montague, Northfield, Bernardston, Buckland, Conway, Shelburne, Ashfield, Colrain, Gill, Charlemont, Leyden, Heath, Plainfield, Rowe and Hawley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
